name: The Eggventures of Mizkif
description:
The Game

Jump your way to victory, avoiding the many obstacles that get in your way.

Mizkif please play this I made it for you.

If you send me proof that you beat the game I will gift you a sub! (Only up to 5 I have no money)

Uncut Playthrough

Twitter

Features
  • 2 Terrible Cutscenes
  • 3 Horrifying Egg-Human Characters
  • 6 Annoying Levels
  • 5 Frustrating Obstacles
  • 30 - 60 Minutes of Thrilling Gameplay
Controls ALeftDRightSpaceJump2x SpaceDouble Jump2x ADash Left2x DDash RightRRestartEscMenu
